TextView.android:text: The function of law is so that there is a higher power that can determine situations. \n - Laws are based on morals and values \n -Laws are enforceable - Laws are established by parliament - There will be consequences if we disobey. There are ethics and morals in business although not enforced. - Morals and values are based on what is good and bad behaviour - The authority generally does not have jurisdiction Things like environmental and social responsibilities are not legally enforceable. A business will act ethically although it is not legally obliged because investors may choose not to invest in a said business due to moral obligation.
